actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $2,500 the amount of interest which may be excluded from gross income, and to make such exclusion permanent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $2,500 ($1,250 for a married individual filing a separate return) the amount of interest which may be excluded from gross income. Amends the Crude Oil Windfall Profit Tax Act of 1980 to repeal the termination date for the tax exclusion of interest and dividend income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $2,500 the amount of interest which may be excluded from gross income, and to make such exclusion permanent.
